articles.author: Anchal Vohra
articles.title: EU, India set for historic trade deal amid US tariffs - dw.com
articles.description: In what's been called a victory for free trade, the EU and India are set to agree on "the mother of all deals" and a defense pact that aims to lure India away from its close political and military ties to Russia.
articles.content: At Khan Market in New Delhi, Atul Mehra was optimistic that a deal between the European Union, the world's single largest market, and India, the world's fastest growing major economy, will revive his… [+7911 chars]
